review: I wanted to be able to watch Netflix in my bedroom...I want to get an Apple TV but I figured I'd give this a try for $35 bucks first. Set up was super easy, had no problems took just a few minutes. Picture quality looks really good too. I typically watch Netflix from the Xbox Live and I like how when you are watching a series it will automatically play the next episode...this doesn't do this. My Iphone will go into sleep mode, like the screen turns off when you don't touch it for awhile. The problem with this is I have to go back into Netflix and try and pause or find the other episode. I have kids, animals, and a husband which I need I usually have to pause the TV a lot...this doesn't pause fast enough for me, especially if my phone goes into sleep mode, its actually a pain. Now if you were going to sit down and watch a movie with no interruptions this would be great...guess it depends what you're used too. It's okay, I like it and for price its a good deal, so I'll keep it...we will find another use for it. I'm going to ask Santa for Apple TV though.
